confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
name: Name
description of letter: Connect with other literature lovers, share your discoveries, and find your next great read in our community of readers and writers.
quote1: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one.
card1: Connect with readers who share your interests and discover new perspectives.
card2: Share your opinions about books and read what others think before starting a new book.
card3: Publish your own texts, receive feedback and evolve as awriter.
card4: Intelligent algorithms that recommend books based on yourtastes and reading habits.
